name: Space Dodger (MEGADETH666)
description:
My first game made in 2 weeks. Pretty hardcore (some said) but i'm pretty shure you can beat it without fails in first try.

So what we got here:

  • Fast-pase shoot-dodge gameplay
  • 13 level that takes 30 min
  • Limited life & ammo
  • Boss fight
  • Great music (from HM2)
  • Power up that makes game playable :D
  • 4 ships to choose

(c) All music was taken from Hotline Miami 2 OST and all rights belong to them.
